text: Marcus Wandt is an astronaut and fighter pilot that is Swedish-Norwegian. In January 2024, he became the first Norwegian astronaut.https://www.vg.no/nyheter/i/5Bx8wW/norsk-svenske-marcus-wandt-i- verdensrommet-for-en-reise. VG.no. Retrieved 2024-01-19 Early life: He grew up outsidehttps://www.vg.no/nyheter/i/abm4eO/norsk-svenske-marcus-maa-bli- vaerende-i-verdensrommet. Retrieved 2024-02-03 Karlstad, Sweden; His mother is from Toten [a traditional district], Norway.https://www.nrk.no/innlandet/den- svensknorske-astronauten-marcus-wandt-_43_-kommer-i-dag-tilbake-til- jorden-1.16756103 ==Space flight in 2024== He was on the Axiom-3 flight that left the Earth (on January 19). It arrived at the International Space Station, on January 20, 2024.https://www.dagsavisen.no/nyheter/verden/2024/01/20/svensknorsk- astronaut-framme-ved-den-internasjonale-romstasjonen/. Dagsavisen.no. Retrieved 2024-01-20 The spaceship (and its crew of four), landed on Earth on February 9.https://www.vg.no/nyheter/utenriks/i/3Ev8PA/tt-den-svensknorske- astronauten-marcus-wandt-er-tilbake-paa-jorda ==Related pages== *SpaceX ==Sources== Category:Astronauts Category:Swedish people Category:1980 births Category:Living people
